title: The Aztec Mummy Against the Humanoid Robot 1958 (Horror, Sci-Fi) Directed by Rafael Portillo

sources.title: The Aztec Mummy Against the Humanoid Robot 1958 (Horror, Sci-Fi) Directed by Rafael Portillo
sources.description:
Epic Clash Between Mummy and Man-Made Monster - in a fight to the Death!
The evil Dr. Krupp, also known as "the Bat," resumes his quest to steal a valuable Aztec treasure from the tomb of Popoca, the Aztec Mummy. Constructing a cyborg with a human brain, Krupp prepares to confront the vengeful mummy. As Krupp pilfers the mummy's tomb and triggers Popoca's fury, a brutal battle ensues between the reanimated adversaries. The robot's electrifying attacks weaken the mummy until Dr. Almada intervenes and halts the mechanical menace. Enraged, Popoca destroys the robot and dispatches Dr. Krupp and his ally Tierno before retreating to find eternal peace.

Original title: La Momia Azteca vs El Robot Humano (1958) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/iplNK6vZzl4


Director: Rafael Portillo
Writers: Guillermo Calderón, Alfredo Salazar
Genres: Horror, Sci-Fi

Main Cast: 
Ramón Gay as Dr. Eduardo Almada
Rosita Arenas as Flor Almada
Crox Alvarado as Pinacate
Luis Aceves Castañeda as Dr. Krupp 
Arturo Martínez as Tierno
Ángel Di Stefani as Popoca, the Mummy
Adolfo Rojas as The Human Robot



00:00 - Full Colorized Movie (with subtitles)
00:04 - Hypnotic past life regression uncovers an Aztec love story and a cursed warrior.
09:38 - Discoveries in an Aztec tomb unveil ancient treasures and a deadly curse.
16:59 - A cursed Aztec warrior rises from the dead to guard his eternal treasure.
22:09 - Betrayal and revenge unfold through a mummy, criminals, and a twisted experiment.
28:22 - A mysterious plan for revenge stirs tension and confusion among the characters.
40:18 - Investigators uncover the mummy's intact artifacts in a chilling cemetery.
43:37 - Detectives chase The Bat and his criminal gang after a string of daring robberies.
48:42 - A scientist creates a powerful humanoid robot for sinister purposes.
55:49 - An epic battle erupts between an Aztec mummy and a humanoid robot in this sci-fi horror clash.
